questions: What is a stethoscope used to amplify?
Sara wants to check her pulse. Where could she check it?
Choose the factors that can increase or decrease heart rate.
What happens to your heart rate AFTER you're done exercising?
option1: It keeps varying for a few hours

questions: Which organ of the excretory system stores urine until the body is ready to eliminate it?
Which of the following mechanisms are used by human beings for the excretion of waste materials from their body?
Which organs help to remove waste from the body?
option3: Lungs, large intestine, bladder, and kidneys

questions: Why is your skin part of the excretory system?
option1: Sweating gets rid of salt and water
option3: Sweating gets rid of carbon dioxide

questions: What is the main function of the excretory system?
option1: To collect and remove wastes from the body
option4: To bring oxygen to body cells

questions: Which of the following is/are an example(s) of excretion?
option1: Removal of carbon dioxide by the lungs
